com.jmex.physics
Class PhysicsDebugger

java.lang.Object
  com.jmex.physics.PhysicsDebugger

public class PhysicsDebugger
extends java.lang.Object

Analoguous to Debugger this class can be used to view physics data such as physics collision bounds, velocity and forces.

Author:
Irrisor

drawArrow

public static void drawArrow(com.jme.math.Vector3f from,
                             com.jme.math.Vector3f to,
                             com.jme.renderer.ColorRGBA color,
                             com.jme.renderer.Renderer renderer)
Draws an arrow in specified color. Should be called directly _after_ drawDebugShape(com.jme.scene.Spatial, com.jme.math.Vector3f, com.jmex.physics.PhysicsCollisionGeometry, com.jme.renderer.Renderer, float) only!

Parameters:
from - starting point of the arrow
to - target point of the arrow
color - of the arrow
renderer - where to draw to
